title: The Catch: Carp & Coarse – v1.0.49212.56
body:

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on The_Catch_Carp_and_Coarse-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-thecatchcarpampcoarse.iso (22,455,095,296 bytes)
  • Game version is: v1.0.49212.56
  • Broken HOODLUM crack replaced with Goldberg emu, enabling all released locations and items in-game. Thanks to Dound1946!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 20.9 to 9.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 7-13 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 22 GB
  • Edit “Engine\Binaries\ThirdParty\Steamworks\Steamv139\Win64\steam_settings\force_language.txt” to change the game language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

You’re set, waiting…. The line tightens, your alarm screams, the fish is on and the battle commences!

Take on the hunt of a lifetime as you target and pursue monster sized fish around the world. With 35 species to hunt you’ll have to work up your strategy, skill and tactics to catch every boss fish in each venue. It’ll take both patience and adrenaline to succeed as you choose your angling spot carefully based on time of day, weather conditions and perfect equipment setup, before casting out into the water to battle and catch these elusive creatures.

It’s all about the catch.
